q_en: I am from The Hong Kong Polytechnic University. Today is July 2, 2024. Please help me create an order for 50 red T-shirts in size M and 30 blue sweaters in size XL.

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, order_name, created_at) VALUES ('1', 'Order20240702120000', '2024-07-02 12:00:00');
steps.description: Create a new order with the default order name "Order20240702120000" for the customer "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE order_name = 'Order20240702120000';
steps.description: Retrieve the order ID for the newly created order with the name "Order20240702120000"

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.attributes = 'Red, M size' AND pt.description = 'T-shirt';
steps.description: Retrieve the product ID for the product with attributes "Red, M size" and type "T-shirt"

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.attributes = 'Blue, XL size' AND pt.description = 'Sweater';
steps.description: Retrieve the product ID for the product with attributes "Blue, XL size" and type "Sweater"

steps.sql: INSERT INTO order_product (order_id, product_id, number) VALUES ('13', '1', 50);
steps.description: Insert 50 units of the product "Red, M size T-shirt" into the order

steps.sql: INSERT INTO order_product (order_id, product_id, number) VALUES ('13', '17', 30);
steps.description: Insert 30 units of the product "Blue, XL size Sweater" into the order

response:
Hello there! üòÑ I'm thrilled to help you with your order. Here's a summary of what we've accomplished:

| **Customer** | **Order Date** | **Order ID** | **Product** | **Attributes** | **Quantity** |
|--------------|----------------|--------------|-------------|----------------|--------------|
| PolyU        | July 2, 2024   | 13           | T-shirt     | Red, M size    | 50           |
| PolyU        | July 2, 2024   | 13           | Sweater     | Blue, XL size  | 30           |

Your order has been successfully created! If there's anything else you need, feel free to ask. üòä
